reviewText: My son loved this video and watched it from age two to five.  Great teaching tool for children, especially if you have the actually hard copy of the "Beginners Bible."  You can also get this product on a DVD with three other titles from this series.
My son (3) loves this.  I ordered the whole series.  Keeps his attention is a great lesson.  I would highly recommend this video.
My son loves the Beginners Bible videos.  Noah is his favorite.  I recommend the entire series.

I liked this video because it tells the story of Noah but iot's definitely for older kids.  I actually looked into another line called Baby Miracle for my younger one who likes it a lot better because it's just much simpler and cuter - wonderful music.

This video is brilliant for youngsters! The story is fun, simple and easy to understand. It delivers a good account of the Biblical version that is well presented. My little son has been fixated to the video for the past week and enjoys watching it over and over again. Well Recommended.

My 21-month old daughter has been viewing and enjoying this tape many times. The characters are so lovable that she feels like imitating them. I  have just decided to order a few other videos from the series "The  Beginner's Bible" and hope that they will be just as good as this one!
